settings.html:
After you have submitted your watch in our showroom in DIFC, we will have it inspected and will provide the estimated time and cost for the requested works and upon approval we will execute the works to your utmost satisfaction.

To maintain the quality of your watch we only use original parts.

Servicing is an important part of maintaining the condition and value of your watch. Depending on the watch, Momentum recommends servicing every three to four years to avoid damage or deterioration.
